Schatten über Camelot
Shadows over Camelot
シャドウズ・オーバー・キャメロット
boardgame.description: Shadows over Camelot is a cooperative/semi-cooperative hand-management and deduction-based board game for 3_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash;7 players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player represents a knight of the Round Table and they must collaborate to overcome a number of quests, ranging from defeating the Black Knight to the search for the Holy Grail. Completed quests place white swords on the Round Table; failed quests add black swords and/or siege engines around Camelot. The knights are trying to build a majority of white swords on the Table before Camelot falls._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On each knight's turn, the knight takes a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;heroic action_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, such as moving to a new quest, building his hand, or playing cards to advance the forces of good. However, he must also choose one of three evil actions, each of which will bring Camelot closer to defeat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Moreover, one of the knights may be a traitor, pretending to be a loyal member of the party but secretly hindering his fellow knights in subtle ways, biding his time, waiting to strike at the worst possible moment..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But enough words... don your cloak, climb astride your warhorse, and gallop into the Shadows to join us in Camelot!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m selling a partial set of painted figures for Shadows over Camelot. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s assumed that you already own Shadows over Camelot and that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve bought the Company of Knights supplement that gives you painted figures for the game. What I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m offering is the remaining figures in the game so that you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have a complete set.
What you will get will be 4 picts, 4 saxons, 12 catapults, 1 holy grail, 1 excalibur, and 1 Lancelot_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s armor. All are painted and sealed, ready for play so that you can have a completely realized game all in color. It really does make a difference visually.
I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t seem to get the pics to work in the marketplace so you can go here to look at my work: http://www.flickr.com/photos/echoota/sets/72157594354388174/ As payment I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m asking $150US + Shipping + Your unpainted set of figures from your copy of Shadows over Camelot. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve painted my set and I need your set in return so I can continue to play my game :)
If you are interested then just complete the transaction and then you can either pay via paypal or send a check or money order with your unpainted figures to my address, and I will then send you this set of painted figures. If you are from outside the US then I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll need to work out the shipping cost to send the figures to you.
I have done work for other BGGers, if you want to see my other work you can check them out on the SoC picts section, or the Fury of Dracula entry.
Thanks for looking!

Days of Wonder - Shadows over Camelot Language: English Players: 3 to 7 Age: 10+ Duration: 60 to 80 min Weight: 1.770 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: In most games, players compete against each other to achieve victory. Shadows over Camelot proposes a journey of a very different kind, where you and your fellow players, as Knights of the Round Table, will collaborate to jointly defeat... the game! At first glance, this task seems simple enough. After all, shouldn’t a band of young and noble Knights - fleet of foot and sound of mind - easily defeat a game that plays itself? Alas your quest is further complicated by the ever-present possibility of a Traitor in your midst, biding his time, waiting to strike at the worst possible moment... But enough words... Don your cloak, climb astride your warhorse and gallop into the Shadows to join us in Camelot! See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
